DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate efficacy of AZD1981 in uncontrolled asthmatic patients on maintenance inhaled glucocorticosteroids.
DOC.brief_title: One Month Dose Response Study of AZD1981 in Asthma Patients Uncontrolled on Inhaled Steroids
DOC.criteria: Six months history of asthma Daily use of inhaled glucocorticosteroids FEV1 4085% of predicted normal Reversibility; increase in FEV1 more than 12% and 200 mL postbronchodilator Other clinically relevant disease or disorders History of smoking of more than 10 pack years Respiratory infection within 30 days
